content: PTH SD Zi Truss-head self-drilling framing screws Truss-head interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling Lightning Tip – upgraded to be Hilti’s fastest, most reliable interior framing screws Extra-robust – built specifically to resist head breakage and tip burn, saving you wasted screws Faster drilling speed – sharpened tips help the screws to efficiently pierce metal Better drywall finish – reduced head stand-off makes it easier to create a flush surface without rework Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Applications Fastening metal studs to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) Fastening wire lath to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Truss head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Truss head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity -
